mapper.select: select sr.ROLE_CODE from SYS_ROLE sr where sr.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and exists(select 1 from SYS_ROLE_AUTHORITY_RELATION srar, SYS_AUTHORITY sa where srar.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and srar.ROLE_CODE = sr.ROLE_CODE and srar.AUTHORITY_CODE = sa.AUTHORITY_CODE and sa.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and exists(select 1 from SYS_RESOURCE resource, SYS_AUTHORITY_RESOURCE_REL sarr where resource.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and resource.RESOURCE_TYPE = #{type} and resource.RESOURCE_PATH = #{pattern} and resource.RESOURCE_ID = sarr.RESOURCE_ID and sarr.AUTHORITY_CODE = sa.AUTHORITY_CODE and sarr.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'))
select sr.ROLE_CODE from SYS_ROLE sr where sr.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'
